pis_title: Interior Latex Paint — Product Information Sheet (PIS)
reference_image: Soft-focus living room wall with smooth mid-sheen finish
Subtle wainscoting detail highlighting refined texture
Gentle brush strokes on plaster and drywall
Muted bedroom corner with soft natural light
Close-up of washable painted surface showing scuff resistance
product_overview: Smooth-sheen interior wall paint that delivers a soft, refined silk-like finish. Water-based and low-VOC with high pigment content for rich, lasting colour; cleans up with soap and water. Apply two coats on properly primed interiors.
short_description: Soft mid-sheen elegance with excellent washability and easy maintenance.
positioning: SilkTouch balances refined shine with practical cleanability for elegant homes, hallways and high-touch spaces.
key_features: Mid-sheen aesthetic with refined silk look

features_benefits.benefit: Gently reflective surface that elevates interiors and resists marks.
Efficient two-coat system on primed surfaces reduces time and material.
Washable film allows routine cleaning with mild soap and water.
Withstands everyday contact in corridors and living areas.
Low odour application and easy soap-and-water cleanup.

recommended_use.intro: Interior wall decoration on properly prepared, primed substrates:
items: Previously painted interiors in sound condition

application_system.label: Primer/Sealer
application_system.purpose: Seal porosity, unify absorption and promote adhesion.

application_system.label: Topcoat
application_system.purpose: Deliver final sheen, durability and washability.

coverage: 90–125 sq. ft./Ltr (≈ 8.5–11.6 m²/L) per coat on smooth, sealed surface
thinner: Clean water; thin minimally only if required for application. Avoid over-thinning.

technical_data.Colours: Available in 108 shades; tintable via Calyco Colour Studio
technical_data.Warranty: 5 years (film integrity) when applied as directed
technical_data.Shelf Life: 24 months from manufacture (store cool, dry; avoid frost and direct sun)

recommended_substrates.description: Interior walls and ceilings after priming
Gypsum board, cement render and concrete

surface_preparation: Ensure surface is dry, clean and sound; remove dust, grease and loose material.
De-gloss glossy areas; repair cracks and holes; sand smooth and wipe clean.
Prime porous/new masonry and drywall with Calyco Interior Primer/Sealer.
application: Apply by brush, roller or spray on a properly primed surface.
Stir well; maintain a wet edge; apply two uniform coats.
Observe recoat times; ensure adequate ventilation.
Clean tools with soap and water immediately after use.

limitations.Protection Period: Protect freshly painted surfaces from moisture for 24 hours
limitations.Application Conditions: Avoid direct sun or hot surfaces; work in sections

storage_safety: Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight.
Keep container tightly closed when not in use.
Use gloves; work in a well-ventilated area.
Keep out of reach of children and pets.

safety_first_aid.Eye Contact: Rinse with clean water for at least 15 minutes; seek advice if irritation persists.
safety_first_aid.Inhalation: Move to fresh air; avoid breathing spray mist.
safety_first_aid.Ingestion: Do not induce vomiting; seek medical attention and show container.
safety_first_aid.Ventilation: Ensure adequate airflow during application and drying.
safety_first_aid.Waste Disposal: Do not pour into drains; dispose of residues per local regulations.

environmental_commitment: Low-VOC, water-borne, solvent-free formulation packaged in recyclable containers.

recommended_uses: Perfect for bedrooms, corridors and living spaces

specs_summary.application_instructions: Apply using brush, roller or spray on clean, dry, primed surfaces.
specs_summary.preparation_instructions: Surface should be dry and clean; apply primer if required
specs_summary.safety_precautions: Use gloves; work in ventilated area
specs_summary.storage_instructions: Store in cool, dry place away from sunlight
